column2: National Center for Health Statistics. AH Provisional COVID-19 Deaths by Age, United States, Week 40 2020 through Week 39 2021. Date accessed [Last accessed date]. Available from https://data.cdc.gov/d/mawz-airi.

Deaths with confirmed or presumed COVID-19, coded to ICDâ€“10 code U07.1. Number of deaths reported in this table are the total number of deaths received and coded as of the date of analysis and do not represent all deaths that occurred in that period. Data during this period are incomplete because of the lag in time between when the death occurred and when the death certificate is completed, submitted to NCHS and processed for reporting purposes.
